# Environment Configurations

Conda environment specifications for different pipeline components.

## Directory Structure

```
env/
├── bokeh.yaml    # Interactive visualization and web app dependencies
├── ibd.yaml      # Identity-by-descent analysis tools (PLINK)
├── pandoc.yaml   # Document conversion and reporting
├── preproc.yaml  # Data preprocessing and file manipulation
└── renv.yaml     # R statistical computing environment
```
